title: New: Los Porcos – C.F.W.
content:
These pigs are funky.

‘Disco House’ bovines Los Porcos impressed with their duo of debut tracks released earlier in the year, the psychedelic, Ariel Pink-esque Do You Wanna Live? and Jesus Luvs U Baby, and now they’ve returned with the refined swagger of new jam C.F.W., merging their previous style with a vaguely Balearic influence. Only three tracks into their career, but damn, the boys from New Pork City beginning to impress.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
